entry.def: A masterstroke is something you do which is unexpected but very clever and  which helps you to achieve something.

example.ex: Graham pulled a masterstroke by playing Paul Merson in the centre of midfield.
example.tran: 格雷厄姆让保罗·默森打中场中路堪称神来之笔。

means.word_mean: 1. an achievement demonstrating great skill or mastery
